name: Archery VR survival
description:
There is only one thing waiting for you inside the dungeon.
Everyone knows it, but no one dares to try it.
But you were the foolish one. The one who couldn't help himself.
You will either get it or die trying...

Hello guys,
my name is Sir Fansi and I make a new VR game every week, so feel free to check this one out and let me know what you think!
If you wanna keep up with what I am doing:
https://www.instagram.com/sir_fansi/
